name: Laser Grid (itch)
description:
Game Description

Laser Grid is a laser puzzle game that happens after a facility loses power. The goal of the game is to restore power to each room. There are 10 levels with the first 5 being tutorial levels.

Controls

WASD: Movement

Right Click (Hold): Shoot Laser

Left Click: Place/Pick Up Laser

Q/E: Rotate Object

X: Lock Object
